CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Click to pull the simulation backwards a bit, or click many times to completely black it out and let it pour forward at the right moment.
CONTROLS.NAME: shock_back

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Push the simulation forward, dulling it out a bit in the process.
CONTROLS.NAME: shock_forward

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose whether the image should be a hard boundary in the simulation (ON) or have a subtle effect (OFF).
CONTROLS.NAME: image_block

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON Allows dark parts of the simulation to be filled in with inverted colors rather than just black.
CONTROLS.NAME: color_inv

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Let the stirrer move around the screen constantly, or turn off to take manual control.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_position

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: auto position MUST BE SET TO OFF. Manually set the position of the 'stirrer'.
CONTROLS.NAME: manual_position

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose whether impulses should happen automatically (ON) or only on your manual command.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_impulse

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Manually cause the stirrer to receive an impulse. Depends on 'motion mode', 'manual position' and 'impulse power'.
CONTROLS.NAME: manual_impulse

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose how powerful the automatic and manual impulses are.
CONTROLS.NAME: impulse_power

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose whether the stirrer creates vortices on high hits (OFF) or pushes the fluid up on bass hits (ON).
CONTROLS.NAME: motion_mode

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Cause the simulation to slowly move inwards or outwards based on the position of the slider. Centered is zero. Careful when maxing out upward, if there is no User Image feeding it, you could kill the simulation and you'd have to restart the scene.
CONTROLS.NAME: in_out
